comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b12) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b12
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b12) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b12

If you move you stumble upon bar near your tabs in tab bar firefox freezes.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Right Click On Url Bar And Select Customize
2.Move Stumble Upon Toolbar To The Right Side Of Tabs In Tab Bar.
Actual Results:  
Firefox 4 Freezes.

Expected Results:  
It shoulde move stumble upon toolbar to the tab bar.Or if it'isnt possible it shouldnt let me do that aciton.Even if it lets me it should give an error message to me about error.Not just freeze.

Classic Theme
Windows 7
6 GB Ran
Geforce GTX 260M Graphics Card
Intel 8600 Processor
comments.creator: unique.ek@gmail.com
comments.author: unique.ek@gmail.com

comments.text:
What Version of StumbleUpon did you test against?
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/stumbleupon/versions/

Does it happen with the experimental flagged 3.81?

Can you provide/attach a WinDbg Log?
https://developer.mozilla.org/en/How_to_get_a_stacktrace_with_WinDbg
